```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
```

# Scatterplot

```{r}
#| label: data-example-scatterplot
set.seed(20260708)
data_scatterplot <- tibble(
  x = runif(10, min = 0, max = 500),
  y = runif(10, min = 0, max = 500)
)
```

```{r}
#| label: json-lite
# The defaults
data <- jsonlite::toJSON(
  data_scatterplot,
  dataframe = "values"
)
```

```{r}
#| label: vis-example-scatterplot
plot_d3_scatterplot(
  data_scatterplot,
  elementId = "example-scatter"
)
```
